experiments.exp_objective: To develop a Multimodal Feature Distillation module that can handle incomplete modalities.

exp_method.exp_method: Implement a Multimodal Feature Distillation module using deep learning techniques.
Train the module with incomplete modalities and evaluate its performance.

exp_merits.exp_merits: The Multimodal Feature Distillation module can effectively distill feature-level multimodal knowledge into different unimodality, even with incomplete modalities.

experiments.exp_objective: To design a Unimodal Feature Enhancement module that can model the relationship between global and local information semantically.

exp_method.exp_method: Implement a Unimodal Feature Enhancement module using deep learning techniques.
Train the module to model the relationship between global and local information semantically.

exp_merits.exp_merits: The Unimodal Feature Enhancement module can model the relationship between global and local information semantically.

experiments.exp_objective: To propose a Cross-Modal Fusion module that can explicitly align the global correlations among different modalities.

exp_method.exp_method: Implement a Cross-Modal Fusion module using deep learning techniques.
Train the module to explicitly align the global correlations among different modalities.

exp_merits.exp_merits: The Cross-Modal Fusion module can explicitly align the global correlations among different modalities.
